text: Stepan Razin () is a 193914 ноября Soviet drama movie directed by Ivan Pravov and Olga Preobrazhenskaya.СТЕПАН РАЗИН It stars Andrei Abrikosov, Vladimir Gardin, and Elena Kondratyeva. == Actors == * Andrei Abrikosov as Stepan Bazin * Vladimir Gardin as Kivrin * Elena Kondratyeva as Alyona Razina * Pyotr Leontyev as Tsar Alexis of Russia * Ivan Pelttser as Grandfather Taras == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1939 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies set in Russia Category:Movies set in palaces Category:Movies set in the 17th century Category:Movies directed by Ivan Pravov Category:Movies directed by Olga Preobrazhenskaya
title: Stepan Razin (movie)
